meanings.definition: A person who shares something with others.
meanings.sent1: The kind sharers brought cookies to share with everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The sharers of the project worked together to complete the task.
meanings.sent3: The generous sharers made sure everyone got a piece of the cake.
meanings.sent4: The sharers of knowledge are like bright stars in the sky, guiding others.
meanings.sent5: The image of the sharers passing around the torch symbolized unity and teamwork.

meanings.definition: Those who have a share or part in something.
meanings.sent1: The company's profits were divided among all the sharers.
meanings.sent2: The land had many sharers who each had a portion of it.
meanings.sent3: The group of sharers in the business meeting all had different opinions.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a small sharer in the vast ocean of ideas.
meanings.sent5: The concept of time has many sharers, each experiencing it uniquely.
